TopicTitle: Launch Pad sound - enviroment - heard during flight!

Articles.Content:
Hi there!

So my problem is...annoying and getting me mad.

- When You switch to te LaunchPad there is this sound environment ( like pumps, generators running )

After launch it stays during the whole flight.

Getting back to any other window - space centre , vab, etc. makes it dissapear - new sound env. loaded.

But after switching to the flights - the lunch pad environment gets back!

All sound all played correctly, background music, decouplers, engines - but there is still "the lunch pad main theme" in foreground.

Any further questions are welcome. When this all might sound... to You unclear.

Best regards

Alan

I have also noticed this sound sometimes. In an older save, I also heard a random decoupler sound whenever I approached the KSC, or loaded a craft on the launch pad.

Another sound bug I have experienced earlier happened when I had executed a burn and then went back the KSC. During the loading time I could clearly hear an engine firing.

Edited November 29, 2014 by Thorium
Fixed typo
